remarks: The identity diagonal is included in all elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Nov-2017.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
metust.1 $e |- F = ran ( a e. RR+ |-> ( `' D " ( 0 [,) a ) ) ) $.
metustidOLD $p |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ A e. F ) -> ( _I |` X ) C_ A ) $.
$d A a $.
$d D a $.
$d F a $.
$d X a $.
